markdownRemark.html: The school is offering an extensive range of dances. They offer classes to children from 2 and 1/2 years old to adults.Dance classes available are - ballet, hip-hop, jazz, contemporary dance, ballroom dancing, tap, acrobatics, contortionist, oriental dance, Pilates and Yoga.
